title: Investigate and fix faulty electrics causing fuse switch to flip intermittently
review: Ashley was great - turned up on time, quickly diagnosed what the problem was and fixed it whilst there.  Took a couple of hours but really professional job done.  Gave some good advice re future electrical checking needed but didnâ€™t try to upsell - genuinely felt like he was telling me for my own benefit, not his.  Would definitely recommend for any electrical jobs needed.
name: Renegade Electrical Ltd
